definition: to come to the end of a phase (idiom)
to say/to tell/to announce/to report/to denounce/to file a lawsuit/to sue
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
paragraph/section/segment/stage (of a process)/classifier for stories, periods of time, lengths of thread etc
surname Duan
to fall or drop/(of the sun) to set/(of a tide) to go out/to lower/to decline or sink/to lag or fall behind/to fall onto/to rest with/to get or receive/to write down/whereabouts/settlement
colloquial reading for 落[luo4] in certain compounds
to leave out/to be missing/to leave behind or forget to bring/to lag or fall behind

sentences.english: The immediate war was over, that really was what the cultural wars were about.
sentences.chinese: 紧迫感没有了，当时的文化论战也就告一段落了。

sentences.english: The Adagio section ends in a relatively subdued and bright mood.
sentences.chinese: 慢板于此处带著节制的开朗情绪中暂时告一段落。

sentences.english: A nationwide manhunt for an alleged child molester is over.
sentences.chinese: 一个全国搜捕骚扰儿童的行动告一段落。

sentences.english: The parlance pressed aforetime, ten inside art gallery arrive this comes to an end for the time being.
sentences.chinese: 按旧时的说法，十里画廊到此告一段落。

sentences.english: For me, a few hours ago, this campaign came to an end.
sentences.chinese: 对我而言，几个小时以前，竞选就告一段落了。

sentences.english: The long multi-layered process is ending.
sentences.chinese: 漫长而且又牵涉许多层面的争取过程，终告一段落。

sentences.english: This also marks the end of this 11-day East Hokkaido journey.
sentences.chinese: 这十一天的道东之旅亦告一段落。

sentences.english: Their consultation over, Igel resumed his study of the horizon.
sentences.chinese: 协商告一段落，伊格尔继续研究地平线。

sentences.english: As for Cosette's education, it was almost finished and complete.
sentences.chinese: 至于珂赛特的教育，它已经告一段落，大致完成。

definition: "Red Poppies", novel by 阿來|阿来[A1 lai2]
lit. the dust has settled (idiom)/fig. to get sorted out/to be finalized
to stop at this point/to end here/to call it a day
to finish/to conclude/completed
coda/epilogue/end
(fig.) to raise the curtain/to lift the curtain/to be a curtain raiser for
termination/to finish/to end/to conclude/to close
to settle (a dispute)/to quieten down/to suppress
protracted (idiom)/long and drawn-out
to wind up/to bring to an end/to finish
up until now/so far
full stop/period (punct.)
the curtain drops/the end of the show
episode/brief interlude
the past few days
unfinished/unresolved
to unfold/to carry out/to be in full swing/to launch
